taskDescription: Wears lightweight health sensors embedded in a wristband and necklace
Asks ALFRED for exercise suggestions after breakfast
Follows ALFRED’s recommended moderate-intensity stretches
Responds to hydration reminders timed to activity level
Listens to ALFRED’s detailed explanations about health routines
Expresses desire for more challenging workout suggestions to ALFRED
Engages with ALFRED’s interactive game combining physical and cognitive tasks
Receives and reflects on motivational feedback delivered through ALFRED
Balances eagerness to push limits with concerns about appearing fragile
Appreciates the unobtrusiveness and comfort of wearable devices
Experiences a mix of motivation and unease about being monitored closely
Eagerly embraces ALFRED’s cognitive games and notifications
Accepts and engages with the hardest cognitive challenges offered
Shares game results and progress with friends through the system
Allows caregiver to monitor personal data and join video check-ins
Uses ALFRED to initiate and participate in video calls to celebrate achievements
Feels motivated by competition and social sharing facilitated by ALFRED
Demonstrates openness to data sharing and social connectivity
Navigates the system with curiosity and positive engagement
Welcomes and responds positively to frequent system notifications
Participates in informal and lively conversations encouraged by ALFRED
Explores and learns new features from ALFRED’s detailed explanations
Allows dynamic personalization by sharing personal and health data
Views ALFRED as an active partner for physical and cognitive engagement
Activates the ALFRED system using voice commands
Explores and learns every feature of ALFRED to gain control over health management
Expresses impatience towards ALFRED’s protective progression
Monitors personalized exercise challenges and adapts effort accordingly
Engages with social engagement prompts initiated by ALFRED
Uses ALFRED’s conversational interface to message family and friends informally
Reflects on daily achievements and challenges via ALFRED’s summary
Prefers ALFRED’s informal and natural tone in interactions
Seeks autonomy and trusts her own judgment over system-imposed limits
Explore new apps on ALFRED to stay active and socially connected
Use voice commands to navigate and interact with ALFRED
Wear health sensors to share personal data securely
Trust ALFRED to protect privacy while providing personalized support
Experiment with new app functionalities to push physical and cognitive limits
